item.title: Israel’s Push Into Gaza City
item.description: We bring together pieces of Times journalism to help you understand the big picture.

item.title: Israeli Ground Forces Move Into Gaza City, Sowing Chaos
item.description: The long-anticipated military assault is aimed, the Israelis said, at routing the militants of Hamas, but it deepened the humanitarian crisis in the G...

item.title: Palestinians Flee as Israeli Troops Push Into Gaza City
item.description: Hundreds of thousands of people remained in the city with hardly anywhere to go. Israel said the ground operation, after nearly two years of war, was ...

item.title: European Countries Condemn Israel’s Ground Offensive in Gaza City
item.description: Some of Israel’s oldest allies criticized its latest military assault in Gaza and warned of a deepening humanitarian crisis.

item.title: Europe’s Extreme Summer Weather Could Cost It Billions
item.description: Heat waves and flooding could cost the European Union $50 billion in damage to buildings and crops as well as a loss of productivity, a new study foun...
